desc: You notice a weakspot that could be further exposed with a swing of your pickaxe...
A small hole on the speaker glistens in the light, just large enough to fit a fishing hook in...
It looks like the boss is literally made of wood... fortunately your hatchet is on hand.
The air feels electric, as though there are spirits abound. Maybe they could be of assistance...
Knowing which toxins will be most effective will aid in your next move...
Perhaps a bone could be dislodged by engrossing it with the end of your net...
Trapping critters has given you a keen sense of where best to strike...
You don't quite know why, but your ability to cook various meals fills you with confidence!
All that time spent in the tube has got to be useful for something, right? Maybe this situation?
You notice the divine signaling to you from their volcanos with what is likely helpful advice...
A good bill of health can help turn any fight around, regardless of the opponent.
The wisdom that comes with large mana reserves will make your moves that more effective...
You take a moment to pinpoint the small areas of weakness to aim for...
You've heard that great defence is the best offence, and are hoping it holds true here...
With a spring in your step, you consider how best to use your agile frame to your advantage...
There's got to be something useful in that massive inventory of yours...
You've learned a thing or two from all your past endeavors, making your next move all the better...
Cake by cake has fallen before you, and how different could a massive boss really be from a cake?
You lean on the vast amount of experience you've accumulated to drive your decision...
Even something as trivial as defeating the weakest opponent can be helpful if done endlessly...
Standing firm against charging mobs has given you determination in situations like this...
The hours you've spent learning to fight with a height disadvantage are sure to pay off here...
Knowledge and skills can only get you so far, but THIS is something you can always rely on...
Dissecting the choccie monsters gives a deep understanding of... wait how does this help?
Construction is a lot more than just building, it's also about breaking stuff...
